items.name: ReactJS
items.stem:
1. Media UI Project

We have developed the UI portal to get the media details and

2. Aigis Web Application

Developed a React UI application to build a suite of 16+ applications for Security and surveillance project. We had used ESRI Map library to show various types of maps visualisation like
  1. Clustering Visualisation
  2. Heatmap Visualisation
  3. Map layer with Custom Icons
  4. Worked with ESRI Team to create a Custom logic to meet business requirements
We have developed a on-premised CDN server to cater our offline requirements of the Production Topology. We have released the Application as an MSI Installer by generating the installation using WiX Toolset
